message: I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. This ensures we both benefit from the initial sum before inflation diminishes its value. Let's secure a fair deal now.
Your offer was a bit imbalanced. Let's be fair to each other, especially considering the money will be worth less if we wait longer.
Bob, I understand you want a fair deal, but time is working against us.  My new offer is 52/48 -  it's a strong compromise to close this out before inflation eats further into our potential gains.
